background.story: A squire of the Kingdom of Orvelia. Traumatized by witnessing the deaths of his parents at the hands of the Demons invading the village, and later, the assassination of his sword teacher, he fears the idea of anyone around him dying. His past has driven him to seek out his sworn brother from his early years in the orphanage, Clause, who joined an expedition, but never returned.

itemIntroductions.weapon: A legendary Holy Sword given to the world by Lua. This legendary artifact materialized 100 years ago when the Demons invaded the Orbis Continent through the Dimensional Gate. According to the legend, the Hero King Kyle used this sword to pierce the heart of the Dark Lord Angmund and brought an end to the war. However, the two simply vanished, and only Aea remained.
treasures: The crown of Kyle, the king of Orvelia and the Hero of Holy Sword. Worn by King Kyle during his expedition to kill Dark Lord Angmund 100 years ago, this golden grown contains the will of the Goddess of Light. After Angmund was defeated, the Crown of Light, along with the Holy Sword, Aea, was left in the place where the king disappeared.

Gauntlet imbued with the blessing of Lua, the Goddess of Light. Gauntlet passed down to the kings of the Orbis Continent. Contains the encouragement of the goddess that allows you to use Valiant Dash towards enemies without any fear.

A rune that proves that one is an agent of Lua, the Goddess of Light. The Rune of Proxy is an artifact of the Church of Lua, and it's given to the knight who wields the Aea, the Sword of Light. The Rune of Proxy pushes enemies with the power of light and increases ATK and morale.

An azure-colored jewel that adorns the Holy Sword, Aea. It is an intense condensation of sacred nature's spirit, bound by the teardrops of Lua, and has the mysterious power to guide the Guardian of Holy Sword on the path of light.
